pullrequest.title: fix Link::AddTorque for Simbody and Bullet, with test

content.raw:
Just a curiosity as we are using this function: with respect to which point the added torque is expressed ? 
Looking at the implementation it appears that for simbody is expressed with respect to the link origin [1] while for ODE is expressed with respect to the link center of mass [2].

[1] : https://simtk.org/api_docs/simbody/api_docs33/Simbody/html/classSimTK_1_1Force_1_1DiscreteForces.html#a0305a15e584e27af583fc0c5243a7925 

[2] : http://robotics.naist.jp/~akihiko-y/doxy/ode0.10/group__bodies.html#g8378560dd168ee8d7a4b74e3de510ebc
